Articles.Content:
So, ive started my first ever lets play thursday! I want to sue this as a training for future lets plays, hopefully leading to ksp when I feel like it.

For now, my Lets Play is focused on Europa Universalis III, and while I aint the best player, I do consider myself adequate, and hopefully that will reflect into the gameplay. My voice was by no means up to the task that early in the morning, but hey, its a start. Any tips or feedback would be very appreciated!

So, without further ado:

is the Lets play! Edited September 18, 2012 by The Cobbler
Looking good, can't wait for the next episode because I like watching people play Europa Universalis III and 40 minutes is the best length of a video for me so you hit the right spot there.
Uploading episode 02 tonight, which is 75 minutes of expansion!
Side note, does anyone know how to get the channel to display the video? It wont show up for me.
Looking forward to watching that later on as I am currently quite bored and that will make my day better.

Side note, does anyone know how to get the channel to display the video? It wont show up for me.

What do you mean? It's there for me unless you mean a Featured tab which you should be able to add when you edit your channel settings.
Its 4 gigs, so itll take some time . If I have time, I might record and render episode 3 tonight

Its 4 gigs, so itll take some time . If I have time, I might record and render episode 3 tonight

4 gigs, WOW. What recording software do you use as I have Fraps and 75 minutes would of taken a massive space on my Hard Drive.

Side Note: How long will Episode 3 be approximately and what sort of time range are you settling for in the future?

I use fraps, and im recording episode 03 now. I hope itll be ~40 mins, which well be my goal for future vids.

Interesting note, the individual clips took up sone 90 gigs, which means i can only record one episode at a time, after which i must render and delete :S

I use fraps, and im recording episode 03 now. I hope itll be ~40 mins, which well be my goal for future vids.

Interesting note, the individual clips took up sone 90 gigs, which means i can only record one episode at a time, after which i must render and delete :S

Thanks for the clarification, that's pretty much what I do but when my computer is rendering the video it is barely usable probably because I'm rendering with Windows Movie Maker . I really need to get something a bit better.
Nah, i do it at night

For now, my Lets Play is focused on Europa Universalis III, and while I aint the best player.

A fine let's play to a fine game! Really enjoying it!

Edited September 16, 2012 by AmpsterMan

Thanks for all of the support guys

Honestly, wasnt expecting this! I just finished recording episode 03, and will be uploading episode 02 abd rendering 03 tonight

Your Welcome, I like to watch YouTubers that have just started and are good at it and once again I'm looking forward to Episode 2.

I've subbed so I can help you as well .

Well guys, minor problems:

I wake up and see they havent finished yet :S

Youtube is nearly done, but the rendering hasnt recognised a file, causing it to keep going for that frame. that means I will have to either wait a day and risk having to wait another day or cut out a piece and wait 1 day
here it is!

Just got home from school to find this and will watch it as soon as I have finished my homework .

Thanks for getting Episode 2 up.
Well, I fixed the episode 3 problem, so it will be uploaded tonight

Episode 03 is up!

This one will be in the new (roughly) standard timeframe for my videos, to ease uploading and the like!
`couldnt record yesterday, ill hopefully ahve time today though! Either way, episode 04 is rendered, so uploading is all thats left for it!

Tim_Barett, dogon11 and me have done a (messy) episode of KSP! I will upload in three days or so!

Edited September 23, 2012 by The Cobbler

SO, the preview episode of KSP is done!

Surf there to catch it!
I'm watching it now, it's looking good.
Episode 10 is up, watch my channel to find it!
Episode 11 is out, for the world to see!
